entry.title: Batch exchange withdrawal to lightning requires covenants
entry.summary: In the email, the sender mentions the importance of ensuring that all splice implementations follow a certain rule to avoid any risks. The sender suggests that if a splice implementation decides to splice again when a prior splice isn't confirming, it will self-resolve once any subsequent splice is confirmed. The email concludes with a farewell message from Greg, which we can ignore for the purpose of this summary.
